about_the_game:
Join the discord!! - I'd love to hear from you to make the game better!

Dive into the depths of Gorathar, an unforgiving cave system teeming with challenges and hidden treasures! Gorathar is a unique rogue-like deckbuilder that tests your strategy, decision-making, and adaptability as you face increasingly difficult monsters in turn-based battles.

FEATURES



1. Strategic Deck Management: With more than 200 unique cards to choose from, build your ultimate deck to conquer the dungeon's trials. Every time you complete a challenge, select one of three random cards to evolve your deck for the next battle.


2. Innovative "Pocket" Mechanism: Introducing a new feature in the world of card games - the "Pocket." You can use your turn’s energy to store cards in your pocket for later use. Cards from your pocket are free until they are discarded, offering a whole new strategic layer. Choose the perfect moment to unleash these pocketed cards and turn the tide of battle!


3. Immersive Gameplay: Engage with a variety of different monsters, each with its own unique strategy to defeat. The deeper you go into the dungeon, the tougher the challenges become. Will you rise to the occasion?


4. Rewarding Progression: Unlock upgrades, power-ups, and special abilities as you delve deeper into Gorathar's mysteries. The combination of strategic deck management and innovative gameplay makes every run a new and thrilling experience.


5. Highly Replayable: With endless combinations of cards and challenges, Gorathar offers countless hours of engaging gameplay. No two runs are ever the same!

Embark on your medieval adventure, explore the depths of Gorathar, and master the art of the deck. Can you survive the dungeon and unearth its secrets?

Gorathar awaits your challenge. Will you answer the call?
